ThingDef.label: Black Dragon Bow
ThingDef.description: An ancient energy bow, it channels Seldore's formidable power to fire precise, destructive bolts. Its dark aura resonates with allies, providing subtle support in combat.

AbilityDef.label: aura of empowering darkness
AbilityDef.description: Conjure the sheer aura emanating from the black dragon bow to buff your allies' shooting accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Holy Prayer
ThingDef.description: A mystical tome, Gabu's Holy Prayer embodies his love for books and knowledge. It projects focused energy bolts in combat and can emit a pulse to instantly tend the wounds of nearby allies.

AbilityDef.label: restorative pulse
AbilityDef.description: Conjure the sheer aura emanating from the holy prayer to restore your allies' health.

ThingDef.label: Holy Knight Commander Spear
ThingDef.description: A formidable spear befitting Noche, a Holy Knight Commander who once lost his place in the Order. It channels focused energy for powerful melee strikes and can unleash a sweeping attack to strike multiple foes in a line.

AbilityDef.label: holy knight's column strike
AbilityDef.description: Perform a powerful sweep from the holy knight commander spear, hitting multiple enemies in an arc or line.

ThingDef.label: Poire
ThingDef.description: A formidable blunt weapon, Gai's Poire is a heavy frying pan serving as both a chef's tool and a brawler's might. It channels his powerful strikes with absolute culinary confidence.

AbilityDef.label: Chef's Grand Feast
AbilityDef.description: Cook a hearty meal for pawns around you, so they can be satiated and happy.

ThingDef.label: Judgement Staff
ThingDef.description: A robust staff, Kagura's Judgement Staff is a conduit for his rapid healing abilities. It delivers very fast strikes, while channeling restorative energy to allies in his immediate vicinity.

AbilityDef.label: ally recovery pulse
AbilityDef.description: Perform a recovery puls to heal a pawn's wounds in an area around yourself

ThingDef.label: Epedo Soleil
ThingDef.description: A legendary gladius, its blade infused with radiant energy. Strikes with precision and subtly inspires its wielder, much like a hero's unwavering resolve in the face of danger.

AbilityDef.label: solar blade drop
AbilityDef.description: Calling down a precise energy blade that strikes the target cell and a 2-tile radius, dealing damage.

ThingDef.label: Vanguard Mace
ThingDef.description: A formidable, heavy one-handed mace that embodies Corca's role as a guard and his power. Its blunt force is capable of delivering immense damage with each swing.

AbilityDef.label: Prism Strike
AbilityDef.description: Use this ability to gain a damage buff, heal and also gain resistance to damage.

ThingDef.label: Fenrir Lance
ThingDef.description: A formidable lance, this weapon embodies Hakuma's resolve. It channels his fiery spirit into powerful melee strikes, ready to lead his tribe in any battle..

AbilityDef.label: blaze thrust
AbilityDef.description: Perform a powerful melee thrust from the fenrir lance, hitting a single target.

ThingDef.label: Excalibur
ThingDef.description: A sacred, legendary blade, said to have awakened from ancient slumber in a sacred forest, now bound to a new path. Infused with radiant energy, it delivers devastating melee attacks and can fire arcing 'Light' projectiles that dazzle foes and are deadly to insects. Its loyalty to you is profound.

AbilityDef.label: Excalibur Sword Cleave
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a projectile from the sky dealing damage.

ThingDef.label: Commander Greatbow
ThingDef.description: A bow with a gold color made of gold and used by those with a golden heart.

AbilityDef.label: Heaven rain
AbilityDef.description: Use this ability to shoot 5 projectiles at an enemy.

ThingDef.label: The Ripper
ThingDef.description: A heavy Scythe, this weapon embodies Sabert's physical prowess and discipline. It is a formidable tool in combat, capable of delivering immense damage with each swing.

AbilityDef.label: The Gatekeeper
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a magic projectile using Sabert's weapon.

ThingDef.label: fountain claw
ThingDef.description: A formidable weapon, this gauntlet is a testament to Izumi's physical prowess. It is a formidable tool in combat, capable of delivering immense damage with each strike.

AbilityDef.label: Bear Punch
AbilityDef.description: Emits a powerful shockwave from the fountain claw, erects spikes from the earth and causes damage to multiple surrounding enemies in AoE.

ThingDef.label: Baran's Dragon Tooth Necklace
ThingDef.description: "A simple but powerful catalyst consisting of a leather cord strung with teeth and a glowing blue crystal charm. When held by a priest, it focuses spiritual energy into tangible bolts of dragon fire."

AbilityDef.label: golden dragon awakening
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a magic projectile using Baran's weapon.

ThingDef.label: Billford's Sweeping Broadsword
ThingDef.description: "A massive, two-handed broadsword favored by Billford. It lacks the elegance of ceremonial blades, relying instead on weight and momentum to cleave through enemies. While heavy to swing, it allows the wielder to hold the line against multiple foes at once."

AbilityDef.label: Aerothrust
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a projectile from the sky dealing damage.

ThingDef.label: Duran's Duran II: Kinetic Hammer
ThingDef.description: "A colossal siege hammer named 'Duran II'. It houses a dynamic generator within its head to deliver crushing blows. While unwieldy, a well-timed slam can destabilize nearby enemies and shatter defensive formations."

AbilityDef.label: Earth's Breaker
AbilityDef.description: Slam the hammer to the ground for area damage.

ThingDef.label: Genpei's Saw-Spear
ThingDef.description: "A heavy industrial harpoon customized by Genpei. The tip features a motorized chainsaw mechanism powered by internal components. It functions as a deadly melee weapon, capable of unleashing the 'Fish King Random Attack'a flurry of strikes so wild and fast it resembles a thrashing leviathan."

ThingDef.label: Hakuma's Ocean Requin
ThingDef.description: "A heavy, ornate crossbow used by Hakuma. Crafted from darkened steel and dense uranium, it fires heavy bolts that resemble swimming sharks. The projectiles hunt their targets with predatory precision, tearing through armor like paper."

AbilityDef.label: Sharking Bite
AbilityDef.description: The wielder overcharges the crossbow to fire a massive shark-shaped bolt.

ThingDef.label: Guardian Aegis Shield
ThingDef.description: "A massive 'Aegis' shield generator carried by Izumi. It is designed to withstand heavy artillery and protect squad members. While it can be used to bludgeon enemies, its true purpose is to deploy a defensive energy barrier during critical moments."

ThingDef.label: Kaiser's Impact Gauntlets
ThingDef.description: "A pair of massive, engine-driven gauntlets. They are complex pieces of machinery, utilizing fuel injection and hydraulic pressure to deliver punches with the force of a train collision. The roar of their engines strikes fear into enemies before the fist even lands."

AbilityDef.label: Seismic Slam
AbilityDef.description: Slam the gauntlets to an enemy dealing massive damage.

ThingDef.label: Nerfen's Two-Wheeled Blade of Still Flame
ThingDef.description: "A peculiar sword with a circular guard, favored by Nerfen. Despite its ornamental appearance, it is a deadly tool of espionage. The blade seems to retain the heat of a forge, ready to ignite at the wielder's command."

AbilityDef.label: Two Wheel Flame Remnants
AbilityDef.description: Slam the gauntlets to an enemy dealing massive damage.

ThingDef.label: Noche's Sacred Tree Sword
ThingDef.description: A ceremonial sword carved from the branch of a World Tree, adorned with green jade. Though it looks decorative, it channels powerful Wind magic capable of freezing enemies. The wielder uses it to empower their allies with the overwhelming spirit of the season.

AbilityDef.label: "It's such hard work..."
AbilityDef.description: Slam the gauntlets to an enemy dealing massive damage.

ThingDef.label: Raven's Carnwennan Sword
ThingDef.description: The legendary Carnwennan, a shadow-sword wielded by the phantom thief Raven. Infused with uranium, it allows the wielder to vanish like smoke. Legend says it once hid a King from giants.

ThingDef.label: Ukonvasara Divine Axe
ThingDef.description: "A massive axe-hammer hybrid forged with Uranium for extreme density. While ancient in design, it houses industrial capacitors within the head. It allows the wielder to call down strikes of high-voltage lightning on distant foes."

ThingDef.label: Prometheus's Creation Needle (SR)
ThingDef.description: A large, specialized sewing needle used by Prometheus. Though primarily a tool for crafting his beloved dolls, it is deadly in close quarters. Its true power lies in the "Flame of Life" it channelsallowing him to animate explosive dolls to protect his solitude.

AbilityDef.label: Doll Bomb Summon
AbilityDef.description: Throw a doll that explodes!

ThingDef.label: Khafka's Coercion Rope
ThingDef.description: A heavy-duty climbing rope modified for combat, woven with green fibers and weighted with jade beads. Khafka handles it with expert precision, using it to scale mountains or subdue opponents. The weighted ends pack a surprising punch, but its true power lies in its ability to wrap around targets, locking them in a helpless bind.

AbilityDef.label: pleasure bind
AbilityDef.description: Khafka lashes at a target and deals damage.
